front.title: Usage and Applicability of BGP Link State (BGP-LS) Shortest Path First (SPF) Routing in Data Centers

abstract.t: This document discusses the usage and applicability of BGP Link State (BGP-LS) Shortest Path First (SPF) extensions in data center networks utilizing Clos or Fat Tree topologies. The document is intended to provide simplified guidance for the deployment of BGP-LS SPF extensions.
